= ods-build-go

ODS Build Go applications

== Parameters

[cols="1,1,2"]
|===
| Parameter | Default | Description


| enable-cgo
| false
| Whether to enable CGO.


| go-os
| 
| GOOS variable.


| go-arch
| 
| GOARCH variable.


| sonar-quality-gate
| false
| Whether quality gate needs to pass.


| sonar-skip
| false
| Whether to skip the SonarQube analysis or not.

|===
